definitions.definition: A state of tranquility , quiet , and harmony ; absence of violence .
examples: Our lounge strives to maintain an environment of peace for the comfort of our customers.

definitions.definition: A state free of oppressive and unpleasant thoughts and emotions.
examples: The safety equipment will give me some peace of mind.

definitions.definition: A state free of war , in particular war between different countries.
examples: May there be peace in our time.

main_definition: A state of tranquility , quiet , and harmony ; absence of violence .
secondary_definitions: A state free of oppressive and unpleasant thoughts and emotions.
A state free of war , in particular war between different countries.
